header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Museums, Parking, Work, Shopping, Weddings, Moving house, Christmas and presents, Interview for a Masters, Money, Future Plans, Pets
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, anecdote telling, telling jokes

and then and then when it doesn't happen you sort of you sort of post-rationalise things and and and sort of say oh well you know fair enough maybe I could have done this and maybe I could have done that but you'd end up driving yourself insane

you know that counts as being in employment

or people I mean really what's happened is people are doing more hours for less money aren't they? so like like my mum now has to work half eight till five and she gets paid less money than she did before
